content.detailedDescription: Saw a bright orange/red/white "fireball" moving in a straight line across the sky above a low flying airplane. seemed solid and kind of changed shape. like a slow shifting pulse. watched it move nw to se till it was out of sight.
content.summary: Saw fireball moving seemingly controlled across sky

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to put rubbish in the dustbin out side and i had a feeling to look up to the sky and first saw an airplane and after that flew by i noticed these two ufos so i quickly went into my kitchen to grab my phone to film them. they were just darting about they were jet black one of them morphed into a perfect ball and then changed back to its original shape,then after a few seconds they flew off quickly so then i went back inside and i couldnt get this off my mind so i decided i've got go out again armed with my phone and to my astonishment they were there darting about in circles then all of a sudden another one joins the out of the clouds and starts doing circles the same as the other two this only lasted a few seconds. then in perfect sequence they all one by one shot off at a fantastic spped. i was in total amazement. so i went back inside and looked at the footage and on the first 34 second video i couldnt see them neither could i on the second video of 1minute 59 seconds, i was very dissapointed how can this be i thought, i didnt delete them a couple of days later i was going to delete them but i decided to really scrutinise the videos and to my amazement in the 1 min 59sec video i saw something fly by so quickly at around 1 min 51 seconds and put the video on pc which is even better so then i decided to slow the video down and noticed something at around 20 seconds. for some reason my phone didnt capture the whole event which is probably down to my poor filming or maybe the film needs investigating more they may be there.This was filmed on a motorola g mobile phone.
content.summary: Went outside to but rubbish had a feeling to look up and there they wer

content.detailedDescription: While viewing the oceans air show on netflix (2010) by the way it is the only air show from oceana on netflix. viewing about 12 minutes into the show you will see a f14 traveling from right to left and an object will be seen behind and above the jet. the object then rapidly descends to the right when viewing on screen. paused this viewing several times and can see a bright top on object before leaving camera view. no assumptions are made as to what it might be! i'm a aviation mechanic and i did work on the f14 at narf or nadep in norfolk. thank you.
content.summary: Viewing on netflix oceana air show 2010. view video at about 12min and 30 sec into show. f14 traveling right to left. object is behind jet and turns and rapidly leaves view from left to right when viewing on screen.

content.detailedDescription: At 10:40p on10/03/14 i was looking south in the sky, then from the west what look to be a blue bottle rocket appeared.But it was slowly traveling across the sky at an incline. i then thought it was a shooting star because of the trail left behind, but this was inside the earth atmosphere and moving too slow. once it got to the treeline descent it seemed to explode into 3 separate parts, which looped up and fell towards the earth.
content.summary: {nd} i thought was a blue bottle rocket, or shooting star

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I had just come home from picking up my brother with my mother, we went inside and i asked my step-dad if he had a knife sharpener. he said yes and we went out to his work van. i really like astronomy and space so as i normally do when i am outside at night i looked up to the moon which was extremely bright. i immediately noticed a yellow air/jet stream near the moon, i looked up the stream and saw a very bright, hovering, yellow light. the light stayed still long enough for me to stay "what is that thing!" my step-dad grabbed the knife sharpener from his van, closed his van door, and look up to where i was looking. as soon as he saw the light it began to move extremely fast straight up. (my step-dad described it as being "like a missile") i first thought the object was a helicopter, then after seeing it go straight up i had no idea what it was. after a few seconds it abruptly changed direction and flew over us. at this point i had already taken the picture and then asked my step-dad to get my mom. he yelled to her and everyone in the house came running out. they were all amazed, but it was so cold and everyone was in their pyjamas they went back inside. i walked back to the door and watched the ufo blink a white light, then it was gone, like the lights had gone out. also, i should mention, i live in the middle of nowhere with very little light pollution and lots of clear land. in the images below i have not edited the picture with the moon and i simply zoomed in for the up close ufo object, notice the trail and the object in the picture.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright yellow light that appeared to hover on the sky near the moon. flew extrmely fatlst over us after going verticle for a few seconds.

content.detailedDescription: The photo was taken at lake anna in virginia. the object was only noticed when viewing the photo. it was not noticed when we looked at the sky.
content.summary: Photo taken at lake anna in virginia. the object was only noticed when viewing the photo. it was not noticed when we looked in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Orange / red ball ... shimmering light   , i went to check my mail after returning home.. when i looked up at a star i noticed it was different ... then waited .. the object slowly moved in my direction till the size of a penny or nickle .. the light would dim down to almost nothing then relocate to the similar area. went to grab my phone , went back out and the object was still there... tryed to take a photo noticed my phone was locked ..Derrr as soon as i unlocked the phone and pressed the snap button ,, it dimed down to nothing  .. 0   like it was in sync with the contact of the snap of my camera... vanished into thin air
content.summary: Its almost like i knew what iwas thinkinkg ... turned the unlock on my phone to take a picture when it dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: my husband and i were taking a walk to the end of our driveway; we live in the woods and wanted to take advantage of the cool weather.  we walked out of the house a little before 9:00 p.M.  on our way back, my husband said what the heck is that in the sky.  it was an orange light high in the sky that almost looked like a fire. i dismissed it thinking it was a chinese lantern or something.  the object was moving extremely fast and the light would be bright then dim then bright again. to me the light looked like it flickered but to my husband it looked as if it was getting brighter and dimmer.  as it started to come over head, i flashed my flashlight to follow it in the sky and could see the outline of the body that looked like  an upside down bulbous triangle that rotated around the light in a counterclockwise motion.  the light was the center and the body moved around the light.  i have never seen anything like it. this thing moved extremely fast across the sky. it freaked me about when i realized the body or something was rotating around the light.  my husband was at a different angle from me when i was shining the flashlight and he saw the outline of a disk or sphere shaped object and did not see the bulbous triangle rotating part.  that is the only way i can describe it.  we continued to walk back to the house and when we saw a second object coming into view.  i ran into the house to get my binoculars and camera.  by the time i made it back outside which was less than a minute the object was completely almost out of our line of sight.  my husband did take a picture but it does not appear to have captured the object.  these two sighting were approx 4 to 5 minutes apart.   we continued to monitor the sky for anything else but nothing.  i have no idea what it was and i am very perplexed on what i saw.  my husband and i both witnessed both objects and had different views.
content.summary: 2 sightings within minutes of bright orange light in the center of an object that rotated around the light in a counter clockwise motion triangular shaped form.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to have a cigarette with my brother at about 7:50pm.  we were talking and i noticed a bright white star like object in the south west sky at about 33 degrees above the horizon.  i saw it start to move thinking it may be a jet.  as we kept watching the object kept moving from the sw to ne.  we did not observe any strobe lights or hear any engine noise.  we both noticed the object wobble and descend.  then the object started to come towards our direction still descending. the object stopped then immediately shot up in continued altitude and the light became red, pink then went out and changed back to red as it went out of distance in a great climb in altitude.
content.summary: Star obect moved from sw to e decending wobble then shot up with a red glow

content.detailedDescription: I am a mufon fi currently inactive, and work as a security officer at a facility in vail. i was patrolling outside at about 6:35 am and as i often do looked up at the sky. the sky was clear and moon was visible and in the 4th quarter. below and to the right of the moon i noticed a bright object in the sky that was too big to be a star or planet, and it was already too bright out for these to be visible. i could not see any movement at this time and took several pictures with my i-phone at 6:40am. i then went into the building, and quickly checked the 'heavens above' site just in case to see if any bright star or planet was in the area, which there was not. i then went outside to the main entrance of the building and again watched the object, which still had not moved. numerous employees and visitors were coming into the building at this time and many of them stopped and observed the object. now we could see that the object was moving very slowly to the east. i took some more photos with my i-phone at around 6:57 am, and continued to watch the object as i patrolled around the exterior. the object maintained a straight and level path as far as i could tell. i felt it was likely a large research balloon and several of the other witnesses thought so too. some of these balloons get up to 120,000 feet and can be several hundred feet in diameter. much later, around 8:00 am i mentioned the object to two more employees and we all went outside and we could still see the object well to the sse. the sun was well up by now. there was very little wind at ground level during the sighting. my curiosity got the better of me and later at home i checked the nuforc site and saw that there were numerous sightings on the 13th around santa fe and albuquerque nm of what turned out to be a jpl research balloon that was launched from a nasa facility in fort sumner nm to the east, but this balloon had come down on the 14th. there was another balloon scheduled to be launched named x-caliber but it was not in the air till the 24th. i called the eagle county airport about 30 miles west of vail and they directed me to the faa. a message to their denver office was returned by a supervisor who told me that as far as the faa knew, there were no large balloons in the area. so i still do not know what this was for sure, but we have had a number of ufo sightings reported in the area lately, including one in breckinridge co on the morning of oct. 3rd, where witnesses saw three white objects moving through the sky, at one time forming a triangle pattern and also lined up in a straight line. these ufos then flew off at high speed. 9news/kusa out of denver reported on it with some video, which looked similar to the object seen over vail. i have had several people who know me tell me about recent sightings they had in glenwood springs and the vail area. i have had two good sightings of lights that suddenly blinked out on me lately, one in august and another on the 2nd of september. i cropped the photos i took and include some of them here, but its really hard to tell anything from the photos.
content.summary: Bright object appeared below and to right of moon, stationary then moved

content.detailedDescription: Observed a star shaped blue light with a red center light @ 915pm. first seen approaching from east. slowed to make a few small circles. then left to nw over horizon at great speed. total observed time was 15 seconds. 2nd witness confirmed same.
content.summary: Blue star shape light centered by one red light.

content.detailedDescription: About 8:30 p.M. on oct 4, 2014 in o'fallon, il. i was smoking out on my back porch of my apartment. it was a clear sky with few strings of clouds. the stars were clearly visible. to the southwest i noticed a point of light miles away in the sky. it was moving to the east. at first i thought it to be a plane. but i noticed the light emitted, never flashed or blinked like on an airplane. it was just a steady white point of light. it didn't move particularly fast. but was odd that i saw no marker lights or beacon lights flashing. i watched the point of light move easterly as it went past a thin line of clouds. after a waiting approximately 2 mins i saw no trace of the point of light. this is the second time i've noticed similar things in the past couple of weeks. i'm definitely going to keep watching the skies.
content.summary: Single point of light moving in sky west to east ddissappearing behind thin string of clouds

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was getting out of her car getting a photo of the sky (pretty clouds) and noticed this object in the photos days later. have researched as much as possible and cannot find anything on the web that resembles this.
content.summary: Viewed from the paddock club apartment complex

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We (my grandparents and i) were driving to great lakes mall, and the sky was just so beautiful i couldn't help looking at it almost the entire time. imagine my surprise when i saw a tiny little white bubble thing floating between two clouds. it was moving in the same direction we were and completely solid in appearance. it couldn't have been a plane, planes from such a distance don't look like orbs. so it wasn't hard for me to assume the thing was a ufo at first sight. i remember feeling really hyper, and my heart started beating quite fast when i realised what it actually had to have been! the object traveled in the same direction we were until it disappeared behind another cloud at the end of the gap.
content.summary: Solid, white orb flying faster than a plane could in the same direction as our car.

content.detailedDescription:
1. having a small bonfire.
2. the changing of the colors.
3. ufo
4. it seemed to stay in one spot and kept changing colors.
5. it was star like and stayed in one spot.
6. it was late and i went inside my house.
content.summary: It stayed in one spot and kept changing colors

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at 445 am . it was very dark. i was on farm road 167.  north of springfield mo. going south. towards springfield. it was a rural area, very hilly and curvy. i noticed the lights of what i thought was a plane. as it passed in front of me , left to right, in the sky . it was very strange. it seemed to be low to the ground. it was either reflective or lit from the inside. there was no physical structure , just a row of grey or lit squares. it had random blinking small lights. i slowed to almost a stop but went down hill and it went behind the trees to the right. i don't think it descended . i did down the hill. i could not regain the site of because of the trees. i was intrigued and puzzled. i had never seen anything like that.  when i got to work  , i made a note, "weird plane " so i could tell my friend when she called. she called me four hours after the sighting and i had actually forgotten until i looked at my note. that was odd.
content.summary: Driving to work, noticed blinking lights like on a plane, but it was not like any plane i ever saw

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard early in the morning when i looked up and saw a bright object high up in the atmosphere, star-like, but as bright as sirius, moving straight up.  it would spurt, slow down to almost a stop, then spurt up again. it did this about 6 times and was then just gone when i was looking at it.  its color changed from green to orange to yellow to red, not flashing but slowly changing from one color to the next.  the sighting lasted from 20 to 25 seconds.
content.summary: Object was high in northern sky moving straight up, would spurt, slow down, then spurt, about 6 times.

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of october 2 my girlfriend and i along with a few friends decided to drive up to deadwood reservoir and take in a day of fishing. we had left our rental cabin in garden valley and headed up highway 17 (banks/lowman rd.)to forest service road 555 aka scott mtn. rd. 

we were exactly 7 miles from highway 17 and decided to take a break a little pee break. i got out and decided to take a few photos given a nice vista point we had stopped at.

i nor any of those in our group ever saw or heard anything and there were no other planes or helicopters in the area. we were all complete oblivious to anything being in the sky, again i was simple snapping some quick photos of the surrounding mountains.

after snapping a few photos we got back in our cars and headed to the lake. i returned home on 10/4/2014 and downloaded all the photos of our trip. it was at this time that i noticed the object in the photo which appears to be several miles away.  

after viewing the photo, enhancing it, and playing with contrast, hue, etc. i have no idea what this object might be.
content.summary: I stopped to take a few photos, did not discover the object until the next day while after downloading the pictures on my computer.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my job working late with my coworker on the nanacoke river in seaford de. i noticed the object by chance by looking up in the sky and pointing it out to my coworker. i thought it was a airplane with a banner with light markers on it at first but then after looking at it for a short time and it getting closer i realized that it was the same triangle shaped ufo i have seen in the past. the object was really big triangle and moving super slow and right over the tree line about 20-30 ft over it on land you riding a bike beside the ufo you could probably keep up with it. my reaction i got goosebumps all over my body and i quickly ran onto a barge we were working on i tried to capture 2 videos of the ufo and my phone wouldn't pick anything up after the indecent my friend called me and shared his experience about the same thing. i lost sight of the object when it just vanished into the sky.
content.summary: 2nd time i have seen this flying extremely slow and huge triangle

content.detailedDescription: Watch the day time skies around chicago about oct 13 2014 for several days, us at least 10 to 20 power anywhere from 10 am to 5pm  i brang them here before in ohare sittings watch them appear soon, i will bring them out its all about wave lengths........ don't even post this, do not report this, just watch the day skies i will do my part, also watch under jets the objects follow under and behind and will gear off and at your direction.....Mainly use 10 to 20 power mag browse the clear day time about oct 13 give or take, no calls please, no contact
content.summary: Its coming

content.detailedDescription:
To be honest i know that the description sounds a bit contradictory. the reason is that its actually one 2 maybe 3 sightings that night. the first:
1. millsboro on godwin school rd about to turn onto rt 24 to head home.
2. i was talking on the phone through my car and something caught my eye
3. to be honest i thought it was a bomb, it was so bright and a different color that i thought at the time when it disappeared there was going to be a a large boom, but there was nothing.
4. well the one was a quick shot down from the sky and then it turned and headed towards seaford, turned down a little and disappeared.
5. to be honest it was excitement, i was talking on the phone with my friend linda and i told her all about it.
6. it disappeared at a downward angle.

the second i didn't have the opportunity to see with my eyes but my friend donald gabriel was telling me about it. the reason he called me was because we both saw this same thing 6 years ago almost around the same time. he is also placing a report on here too so you may be able to find it.

another friend crystal saw an orange glow above the trees in seaford but it quickly disappeared but we are thinking all 3 are the same in some way.

there was a black helicopter swarming the area around the same time. no spot light it was just black with red lights. all i know is that something was up. we tried to get a picture of these but for some reason which donald will explain the camera on his phone jammed and my sighting was too quick and i was talking on the phone during the sighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Well there is actually a double sighting that i am reporting that may have a connection.

content.detailedDescription: I was making a delivery to kitchen,about 10 am. looked straight above me and saw very shiny object. looked at it for about one minute and when i came out a few minutes later object was gone.
content.summary: Looked straight above me and saw very shiny disc.Was making a delivery to kitchen and when i came out object was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
Resido na zona rural, em posição na frente de  minha casa vejo duas luzes estáticas avermelhadas, não habitual na posição, no dia seguinte não estava mais no local. 

as duas luzes vermelhas pela distancia observada +- 1000m, apresentava um espaçamento entre elas de 1/2"    

no momento imaginei se tratar de ufos, pois a região de avistamento é uma zona pecuária em uma fazenda vizinha, não habitavel  

tentei posicionar o local na imagem de satélite no google.

minha casa :-2.949536, -47.450043

local da posição das luz: -2.948861, -47.456620

fique muito apreensivo com o fato, no dia seguinte fui ate o proprietário do local salientar o fato, porem este não deu muita atenção, mas não descartou a possibilidade.

a titulo de informação, próximo ao local a 40 km tem uma mineradora de bauxita em atividade e a 100 km duas mineradora de caulim.
content.summary: Resido na zona rural, em posicão a minha casa vejo duas luzes estáticas, não habitual na posição, no dia seguinte não estava mais  .

content.detailedDescription:
October 02 2014 at the 10pm tv tva weather report in downtown montreal canada. colette from tv, tva 10pm reports the weather, and over her right shoulder at video time laps 37:14 you see an orb appear and descends in straight line behind buildings at a 365 degree. thousands of montreal residents must have seen it on the most watched local tv program or in real time. no crash, big round aura, no lights, no glow, no trail,............. just there. i don't know what it was but its no comet et asteroid or nothing like that cause by the size and speed it went down the reporter and half the city would have been smashed and no plane of todays time could stop to zero a couple of feet from ground at that speed. by the distance of the reporter and back ground seen, the orb must have been 50 to 100 feet in diameter. when called the station, no one new anything??

here's the link.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

they will probably remove it soon............ please give back feedback.
thanks.
content.summary: Tv weather reporter, orb appears & descends down in background

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my partner were sitting home with the balcony opened, facing west.
all of a sudden (18:25) we noticed a flat white flying object (object a) in the sunset,over the ocean, it flew slowly and silently towards the north.
at first, we thought it was an airplane, but soon after we realized that it's yom kippur in israel, and that all flights in the country stopped a couple of hours before then.

a few minutes after, an identical object but smaller in length (object b) appeared in front of it (further away towards the north), and flew in the opposite direction.

both of them kept flying, in an identical speed.

during their way, they were one above the other,(object a above object b) and to us they seemed dangerously close to each other.
after then, object b got slightly less visible than it was, but kept flying in the same speed and direction.

they gradually got further away from each other.


around 5 minutes after, when they were quite far from each other, they both disappeared (faded away) at the same time.

location:
we reside in tel aviv, facing west, (quite close to the ocean, jaffa)

further info:
- the objects were completely silent.
- the obejcts did not leave any trails
- the objects did not change their direction or change their length at all.
- we looked into the flights list in that day, and they completely stopped at 15:03.
- the sky was clear, no clouds at all, sunny weather.
- the country is currently very alert to every unidentified object around and inside of it,
so it is very strange that it didn't trigger anything (e.G automatic danger sirens we have)
content.summary: A flat white flying object was spotted above tel aviv flying north slowly in a straight line, a couple of minutes after another one in a smaller length appeared in front of it and flew in the opposite direction, after several minutes they both disappeared

content.detailedDescription: A little after 8pm the wife went to put the trash out and directly over head was about 10 gold orbs with more coming from the horizon. we live in the woods so the horizon is about 45 degrees higher. she came running in and retrieved me from my recliner. i reluctantly walked out. wow what a site. from over head to as far south into the trees as i could see were these small slow moving and very silent moving orbs. i asked the wife to get the phone. all moving in a northern direction very low and close to us. no pattern or formation just a random group. 2 or 3 broke off to the east over the river. a few appeared to pause or hover in the south. one stopped at what appeared to be over the neighbors house and ejected four tiny balls which fell in a circular or spiral action. at least 2 or 3 disappeared as they were moving towards us. there were to many to count when i first saw them and another 10 or more kept coming towards us. i got the phone and took 16 horrible pictures of the last one or two. when they finished coming i jumped in the truck and drove to the top of the mountain. we live in a deep valley but on top of the mountain i can see for ever. it was perfectly clear and i could see none of them. we live in a remote area but there was an unusually large number of trucks and cars evacuating the area. i believe there were a few other people that witnessed this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: More then 20 slow moving orbs

content.detailedDescription: The picture was taken at 7:31 p.M. at the intersection of northbound macarthur and sam rayburn tollway in lewisville texas.I was just looking to the left which was west towards the sunset and i noticed a cloud and i saw what appeared to me to be a perfect circle in the clouds which i thought was pretty cool so while stopped at the light i snapped a picture. i've seen a lot of various shapes and sizes of still,moving and swirling clouds living in texas my entire life and i thought "a perfect circle...? that would be a first so being intrigued i examined the photo closer and i don't know what that is in the clouds but i know there is something. when i first saw it i was really stunned because off the top of my head i couldn't think of anything that could make a perfect circle, not leave any kind of exhaust,vapor trail or evidence of even being around. please respond asap. thank you so very much for your expert insight and time. the picture was taken on 9-30-2014@7:31 in the evening.
content.summary: Looking towards the west at the sunset and i noticed a cloud with what appeared to me as a perfect circle which i thought was pretty cool so i snapped a picture while stopped at a stoplight.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a man of age 45 and used to watch flying planes and helicopters .I was in my balcony and sunlight was in atmosphere and i was about to start my tea.
on hearing helicopter sound i watched at it.I observed a big dot like shape behind tail rotor.I thought of it to be a bird for a fraction of second.But when i saw its movement was in the same path as of helicopter with steady speed and stability looked almost in sync with helicopter but distance between the two kept on increasing by small amount.It took not much time to understand me that it was not a normal thing. as helicopter was moving i kept watching it.I retracted it after passing behind tree top.As it was going away 
i lost its sight behind trees of park in front of my balcony.My approx co-ordinates were 28.703320, 77.150993.
content.summary: When watched a helicopter, a small black point was behind tail rotor and followed helicopter

content.detailedDescription: The reporting witness was heading northbound on ward parkway and stopped for the traffic light at 55th st.  looking forward, he saw what he described as an amber colored orb around 7 pm.  the object blinked on and off as it traveled.  he saw the object for about 3 seconds somewhere between pembrook hill school and woodside racquet club.
content.summary: At stoplight and saw an orb in the distant daylight sky

content.detailedDescription: We went outside at 3:20am and i noticed a really bright pulsating light so we look harder at it and notice red green and purple pulsating lights. so we grabbed the binoculars and observed flashing pulsating lights (in the order from left to right) green,yellow, purple and red. we could tell that the object was flat at the bottom and round. it was hovering but then started moving closer and erratically right to left. then we noticed a plane from the south flying toward the object. as the place got closer the object ascended very quickly and away from the oncoming place and then started to hover completely still. the plane passed and was much lower than the object. it started to get further away and was staying pretty stationary but was moving to the right and left a lot. another plane went straight for it about 10 minutes later and did the same thing the other plane did but the object didn't move. the plane flew by. we watched it move closer, left, right, further away. we watched for 45 minutes but it's still in the same area. it's been there for about an hour now. i don't know how long it was there before we saw it. it's a huge craft, very far away and high in the sky but we could definitely tell every time it moved or got closer or further away. very crazy experience. frightening, yet i couldnt look away. this is my third ufo experience in this area of texas and i haven't gone looking for it, just happened to look up at the right moment.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green yellow purple and red pulsating lights from a flat round craft
